tha-ap232:0.3_0: Hearing his speech, the most senior monk,
tha-ap232:1.1_0: O hero, with pray run back,
tha-ap232:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap232:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap232:2.4_0: And this is the fruit and result.
tha-ap232:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap232:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
tha-ap232:6.1_0: He was the tenth sections with one senior monks, the tenth training rules.
tha-ap232:9.6_0: The courtesan, too, taught the Dhamma.
